description.en: Master's thesis is an independent written work that is based on an experimental or theoretical scientific research
description.et: Magistritöö on eksperimentaalse ja teoreetilise teadusliku uurimuse põhjal koostatud iseseisev kirjalik töö.

objectives.en: 1)	To deepen the student's knowledge in the field of bioengineering
2)	To develop the ability to plan, to do and to present the research in the field of bioengineering.
objectives.et: 2) Arendada üliõpilasel erialase uurimistöö planeerimise, läbiviimise ja esitamise oskusi.

objectives.en: 5)	To develop skills in academic writing

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has completed the module:
1) can apply acquired knowledge in formulating scientific problems, in planning and conducting research, in making conclusions based on the collected data;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) tunneb süvendatult valitud valdkonda ja oskab formuleerida selle raames kaitsmisele esitatud teese;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) is able to present and critically analyze positions published in professional literature and present and justify their personal standpoints and conclusions;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab esitada ja kriitiliselt analüüsida erialases kirjanduses avaldatud seisukohti ja esitada ning põhjendada oma seisukohti ja järeldusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) have skills for composing and conducting a presentation in public and to express himself/herself in his/her specialty in written and oral form;
learning_outcomes.et: 3)  tunneb valdkonna uuringute teaduslikku taset ja rakenduslikku väärtust;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows how to prepare and present a public presentation and participate in scientific discussions;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab koostada ja pidada avalikku ettekannet ning osaleda diskussioonides;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) knows the requirements set for a research paper and is able to formulate research results according to these requirements;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) teab teadustööle esitatavaid nõudeid ja oskab vormistada oma töö tulemused neile vastavalt;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to conduct practical work related to the Bioengineering field
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab läbi viia erialaga seonduvaid praktilisi töid.

grade_preconditions.et:
1. Student must submit a written application signed by supervisor that he/she/they agree(-s) to supervise student.
2. Student must submit the MSc thesis by deadline - 20.05.2025.
3. Student must submit supervisor's opinion (where it is clearly stated that student is allowed to defend the thesis) together with submitting graduation thesis.
4. Student must submit the application for appointing the reviewer of the gradiation thesis signed by student, supervisor and reviewer.

Thesis application template can be downloaded from here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZFpDU-WrMg7rVQsMbr6Dp6SB_Uhgz70tC5PJZ9qlCH8/edit?usp=share_link

Thesis template can be downloaded from here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ezjgg2RE9un4xORGOASlm-dclgZ8Le5g/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=102926644254385956316&rtpof=true&sd=true

Application for appointing the reviewer https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QuJEMoJ6p6OgZoAInnloPu-pkr7AnEhm/edit?usp=share_link&ouid=102926644254385956316&rtpof=true&sd=true

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
